FuncDef: This command configures the length for the local L2TPv3 nonce (random number) value used in the Nonce AVP. Thedefaultparameter only applies in theconfig>router>l2tp>group>l2tpv3context

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the length of the Nonce AVP value. Values-16 to 64.
In the config>router>l2tp>group>l2tpv3, this parameter references the nonce length configured in the config>router>l2tp>l2tpv3 context.
